citation: Proclamation under the Dangerous Goods Act 1998 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Dangerous Goods Act 1998

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under the Dangerous Goods Act 1998 fix 1 January 1999 as the day on which that Act commences.

14 December 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 December 1998

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
